alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 11:41AM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM CST /4 PM EST/ THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST /7 AM EST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow producing occasional white out conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph expected. Wind chill values of 25 to 35 below zero expected. * WHERE...Lake IN, Newton, Jasper and Benton Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM CST /4 PM EST/ Thursday to 6 AM CST /7 AM EST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Falling or blowing snow may result in white out conditions with zero visibility at times, making travel extremely difficult. Power outages will also be possible as a result of strong wind gusts to 50 mph. Roads will likely quickly become ice covered as temperatures rapidly fall late Thursday afternoon into early Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 25 to 35 below zero are likely Thursday night through Friday night. Wind chills of this magnitude can cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
